channel.title: 639 Dialogue help
channel.description:
I've got a dementhium base, I've been trying to ad dialogues in. I found this and been reading.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,526538.msg3835761.html#msg3835761
But how do I make the npc talk after I talk and keep contining?
Here is what I currently have:
[code]case 0: sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, -1, 1, "Woahh! What is this place?"); return true;[/code]

item.title: 639 Dialogue help
item.dc:creator: @MelStone MelStone
item.description:
@MelStone wrote:

I’m pretty sure you add another case since you wanted to continue and since you told it to continue to 1, you add case 1: sendDialogue(…
beneath it.

Read full topic
